item.description:
@imantai wrote:

How would i add So when player gets 30 str he gose a talks to hans and claims his Reward.!

case 14608: //Hans sendFrame126("Hans", 4902); sendFrame126("Ah?", 4903); sendFrame126("Welcome to weedscape", 4904); sendFrame126("Why dont you Go train And come back when u have 40 str", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
